name: Escape The Employees (Cam_mrchl)
description:
An office boss forgot to put coffee back into the coffee machine. Impossible for its furious employees to work in these conditions. There is only one solution for the boss: to run away.

Controls :

Move : WASD/ZQSD

Interact : E

Shoot : Left Click

Punch : Right Click

Thank you for playing our little game. And promise the next time we will not forget the coffee.
